content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":895343,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ca217e06-e18b-42b0-b7ea-3a88eb03b906/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ca217e06-e18b-42b0-b7ea-3a88eb03b906/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ca217e06-e18b-42b0-b7ea-3a88eb03b906\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":993,\"height\":405},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Â \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bookatable\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", we are looking forward to you being a part of the team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This Module is designed to give you an understanding of Bookatable, its products, customers, and things you'll be working on or with, when you start your new role!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the end of this module, you will be asked to take a short test to check how you've learned the material.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
